name: The Missing Key (MetalChouchen)
description:
The missing key
A game made for the global game 2021 (Online)
Theme : Lost & Found

---Goals---
You are locked in your own haunted house and you need to find the key.

You zoom in/out on most elements. Differents actions are proposed depending on if you zoom in or not.
As you are playing you can alterate the house which can also give you differents actions.

---Commands---

A or Q : Action
Z or W : Zoom In/Out
Arrows : Move
R : Restart
Escape : Quit

---Special Commands (Can break the game)---
O : Took a screenshot
P : Zoom on player
H : Switch to LowRes camera
J : Lower game resolution
K : Increase game resolution

---Credits---

***Team***

Composer: @GrizlyCogs soundtrack can be found at https://grizzlygames.bandcamp.com/album/the-missing-key
Programmer : @metalchouchen
